dimensions.label: Career Orientation
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach their professional life?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be driven to start and manage their own projects and businesses, seeking innovation and independence.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security in their professional life, valuing structure and tradition over individual initiative.

dimensions.label: Critical Thinking Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on objective, data-driven analysis to evaluate and solve problems, minimizing personal biases.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and gut feelings when approaching complex problems, allowing for more creative and spontaneous solutions.

dimensions.label: Learning Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin acquire new knowledge and skills?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take ownership of their own learning, setting goals and finding resources to achieve them independently.
Your FarTwin will prefer a more traditional, formally-structured approach to learning, such as classroom-based instruction or mentorship.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in group settings?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach collaborations as opportunities to outdo and surpass others, prioritizing their own interests and ambitions.
Your FarTwin will focus on mutual support and shared goals, working together with others to achieve common objectives.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin view the world and its diverse cultures?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tend to focus on their own local context, with limited awareness or interest in global issues and international relations.
Your FarTwin will be curious about and engaged with the world's diverse cultures, seeking to understand and learn from other perspectives.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their emotions and handle emotional situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will openly express their feelings, being transparent and honest about their emotions and needs.
Your FarTwin will tend to keep their emotions private, preferring to manage and hide their feelings from others.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity and artistic side?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be free to explore and express their creative thoughts and ideas, using various forms of artistic expression.
Your FarTwin will likely feel pressure to conform to external expectations or norms, potentially stifling their natural creativity and self-expression.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty and risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be drawn to high-risk, adventurous situations, seeking excitement and challenge.
Your FarTwin will tend to avoid risks and uncertainty, prioritizing stability and security over potential rewards or benefits.
